      • setInitialContextFactory

        public static void setInitialContextFactory(String className)
        Set the initial context factory.
        Parameters:
        className - The class name, must be an instance of InitialContextFactory

      • setDefaultInitialContextFactory

        public static void setDefaultInitialContextFactory()
        Set the initial context factory.
        See Also:
        JNDIInitialContextFactory

      • bind

        public static void bind(String jndiName,
                        String factoryClassName,
                        String className,
                        String[][] data)
                 throws NamingException
        Bind a ressource to JNDI.
        Parameters:
        jndiName - The path-separated name (that doesn't start with a slash) of the resource, relative to the default initial context "java:comp/env/".
        factoryClassName - The factory to use, must be an instance of ObjectFactory
        className - The class name of the resource, according to the factory.
        data - A list of name-value.
        Throws:
        NamingException - When a JNDI exception occurs

      • bind

        public static void bind(Context context,
                        String jndiName,
                        String factoryClassName,
                        String className,
                        String[][] data)
                 throws NamingException
        Bind a ressource to JNDI.
        Parameters:
        context - The JNDI context.
        jndiName - The path-separated name (that doesn't start with a slash) of the resource, relative to the context.
        factoryClassName - The factory to use, must be an instance of ObjectFactory
        className - The class name of the resource, according to the factory.
        data - A list of name-value.
        Throws:
        NamingException - When a JNDI exception occurs

      • bind

        public static void bind(Context context,
                        String jndiName,
                        Reference ref)
                 throws NamingException
        Bind a ressource to JNDI.
        Parameters:
        context - The JNDI context.
        jndiName - The path-separated name (that doesn't start with a slash) of the resource, relative to the context.
        ref - The reference of the resource to bind.
        Throws:
        NamingException - When a JNDI exception occurs

      • bind

        public static void bind(Context context,
                        String jndiName,
                        Object o)
                 throws NamingException
        Bind an object to JNDI.
        Parameters:
        context - The JNDI context.
        jndiName - The path-separated name (that doesn't start with a slash) of the resource, relative to the context.
        o - The object to bind.
        Throws:
        NamingException - When a JNDI exception occurs

      • createReference

        public static Reference createReference(String factoryClassName,
                                        String className,
                                        String[][] data)
        Create a reference to a resource.
        Parameters:
        factoryClassName - The factory to use, must be an instance of ObjectFactory
        className - The class name of the resource, according to the factory.
        data - A list of name-value.
        Returns:
        A reference to a resource.

      • lookup

        public static Context lookup()
                      throws NamingException
        Lookup the context "java:comp/env"
        Returns:
        The context "java:comp/env"
        Throws:
        NamingException - When a JNDI exception occurs

      • lookup

        public static Context lookup(String path)
                      throws NamingException
        Lookup for a context.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the context to lookup.
        Returns:
        The context to lookup.
        Throws:
        NamingException - When a JNDI exception occurs
        See Also:
        lookup()
